crtloss sft node : y = ((x) / 1497.8439959551713)^1.7566227386393405
crtloss ppo node : y = ((x - 4.989347628585528) / 1450.341696971857)^1.6268328800037994
actloss sft node : y = 0.1281538209891901 + (0.32398079393413726 / 1.063888085444664^(x))
crtloss ppo dim10 (exp decay) : y = 0.010367573247300522 - (0.0149793674801384 / 1.1967205534350558^(x))
crtloss ppo dim20 (exp decay) : y = 0.029125041450767598 - (0.06633751137705872 / 1.510617712203373^(x))
